translated: I was born into a high family,
with much wealth and great riches.
I was endowed with beauty and form,
the daughter of Majjha, born of his womb.
I was sought after by princes,
I will give eight times that amount,
the world’s chief, the unsurpassed one.
I bowed down at his feet

analyzed: ekamantam upāvisi  saḥ me dhammam adesesi
translated: and sat down to one side.🔽Out of compassion, Gotama
While sitting on that very seat,
Then I cut off my hair
since my craving has been extinguished.”
